contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 2, 1981 D NSW State Championships (Junior B Grade)
NSW State Championships (Junior B Grade) 120 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest NSW State Championships nsw-state-championships-junior-b-grade
None Australia
Youth
A Holiday Suite
Trinity Grammar School, Summer Hill, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia NB Reg Bishop was the brass adjudicator, but his band was in this section. The concert band championships were held concurrently and the adjudicator was Victor Grieve, who conducted a band in the Junior A Grade Concert Section, which also had three bands entered. As the two sections were running at the same time in different halls it seems likely that the adjudicators swapped halls so that they could conduct their own bands. Thus we suspect that Victor Grieve adjudicated this section.
Vic Grieve adjudicated this section
Sept. 16, 2014, 2:43 p.m. Oct. 10, 2016, 12:36 a.m.
1 Christian Brothers High School Lewisham Bruce Hicks Second Rhapsody on Negro Spirituals
2 Sutherland Shire Brass Frank McGuinness Glastonbury
3 St.Patricks College ---Sutherland (NSW) Reg Bishop The Magic Flute [unknown arranger]
